TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlPersonalizationProvider extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider

summary.span: 实现一个使用 Microsoft SQL Server 的个性化设置提供程序。

span.span: Implements a personalization provider that uses Microsoft SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类定义个性化设置提供程序使用 Microsoft SQL Server 所需的功能。This class defines the required functionality for a personalization provider using Microsoft SQL Server. 个性化设置提供程序加载和存储代表个性化数据实例。A personalization provider both loads and stores personalization data on behalf of a instance. 此类实现读取和写入到运行 SQL Server 的计算机的逻辑和实现所有抽象方法中也定义。This class implements the logic for reading from and writing to computers running SQL Server, and also implements all the abstract methods defined in . 个性化设置提供程序的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on personalization providers, see . 使用 SQL Server 的 Web 部件个性化设置的数据设计依赖于存在两个常见的 SQL 数据库表，并且其支持存储过程，对于大多数基于 SQL 的功能实现共享。The data design for using Web Parts personalization with SQL Server relies on the existence of two common SQL database tables, and their supporting stored procedures, that are shared for most SQL-based feature implementations. 这些表和视图安装和卸载使用以下脚本：These tables and views are installed and uninstalled using the following scripts: - installpagepersonalization.sql – 安装个性化表、 视图和相关的存储的过程。installpagepersonalization.sql – Installs the personalization tables, views, and related stored procedures. - uninstallpagepersonalization.sql – 卸载个性化表、 视图和相关的存储的过程。uninstallpagepersonalization.sql – Uninstalls the personalization tables, views, and related stored procedures. 务必要注意个性化设置将失败，如果 Web 应用程序未运行在默认信任级别的或更高版本 (你可以在 Web.config 文件中使用设置自定义信任级别``元素)。It is important to be aware that personalization will fail if your Web application does not run at the default trust level of or higher (you can set custom trust levels in a Web.config file using the `` element). 和类这两个信任级别的检查初始化时。The and classes both check for a trust level of when they are initialized. 如果你配置你的应用程序运行在的信任级别的，并使用默认提供程序来管理你的应用程序，个性化数据将应用程序尝试访问个性化数据的第一个时间失败，因为在中运行 ASP.NET 工作进程信任没有调入的各个类中所必需的权限命名空间。If you configure your application to run at a trust level of , and you use the default provider to manage the personalization data for your application, the first time that the application tries to access personalization data, it will fail because an ASP.NET worker process running in trust does not have the permissions necessary to call into the various classes in the namespace.

MemberSignature.Value: public SqlPersonalizationProvider ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: SqlPersonalizationProvider();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 创建的实例将调用构造函数为应用程序的配置中指定的类。The constructor is called by ASP.NET to create an instance of the class as specified in the configuration for the application. 此构造函数不应在代码中使用。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ApplicationName { get; set; }
.property instance string ApplicationName
Public Overrides Property ApplicationName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ApplicationName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要存储和检索其个性化设置信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application to store and retrieve personalization information for.

value.span: 要存储和检索其个性化设置信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the application to store and retrieve personalization information for.

value.span: 默认值为当前 的 属性值。

span.span: The default is the property value for the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性由类对用户信息进行分组。The property is used by the class to group user information. 通过限定与应用程序名称的用户信息，你可以存储在单个数据库的多个应用程序的信息，而不会遇到重复的用户名称之间的冲突。By qualifying user information with an application name, you can store information for multiple applications in a single database without running into conflicts between duplicate user names. 此外，多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以通过指定相同的值中使用相同的用户数据库属性。Also, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same value in the property. 可以以编程方式设置属性或可以在 Web 应用程序使用的配置文件中以声明方式设置`applicationName`属性中``部分。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application using the `applicationName` attribute in the `` section. 如果没有为指定值`applicationName`Web 应用程序的配置文件中的属性则使用对应用程序所做的第一个请求的属性值。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the property value for the first request made to the application is used. > [!CAUTION] > 因为服务的所有请求使用单个默认个性化设置提供程序实例对象，您可以有多个请求并发执行，并尝试设置属性值。Because a single default personalization provider instance is used for all the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 属性不是线程安全用于多个写操作，并更改属性值可能会导致多个用户的应用程序的意外行为。The property is not thread-safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建议你避免代码，以允许用户设置属性所需除外。It is recommended that you avoid code to allow users to set the property unless required. 应用程序的示例设置属性可能需要是管理应用程序管理多个应用程序的个性化数据。An example of an application where setting the property might be required is an administrative application that manages personalization data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序和不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.

exception.span: 此属性设置为一个长度大于 256 个字符的字符串。

span.span: The property was set to a string with a length greater than 256 characters.

public: override System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PersonalizationStateInfoCollection ^ FindState(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PersonalizationScope scope, System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PersonalizationStateQuery ^ query, int pageIndex, int pageSize, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % totalRecords);

summary.span: 根据指定范围和参数返回一个包含零个或零个以上 派生对象的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection containing zero or more -derived objects, based on the specified scope and parameters.

returns.span: ，包含零个或零个以上 派生对象。

span.span: A containing zero or more -derived objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 受约束的返回的项集`pageSize`和`pageIndex`参数，其中`pageSize`控制要返回的记录数和`pageIndex`控制要返回哪些记录。The set of returned items is constrained by the `pageSize` and `pageIndex` parameters, where `pageSize` controls the number of records to return and `pageIndex` controls which records to return. 例如，`pageIndex`为 0 和`pageSize`25 个，则将返回前 25 个匹配项，而`pageIndex`的 1 和`pageSize`25 个，则会返回匹配项 26-50。For example, a `pageIndex` of 0 and a `pageSize` of 25 would return the first 25 occurrences, while a `pageIndex` of 1 and a `pageSize` of 25 would return occurrences 26-50. 如果你想要获取所有可用的记录，设置`pageIndex`为 0，和`pageSize`到。If you want to fetch all available records, set `pageIndex` to 0, and `pageSize` to . -派生的对象返回的字母顺序排序的和，不管是在升序排序。The -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order sorted by and , both in ascending order. 此方法将查询通配符字符传递给基础数据存储区。This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 当前依赖于每个提供程序处理如星号 （\*）、 百分号 （%） 或下划线 (_) 字符的方式是支持通配符。Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常情况下，对于符合 SQL 数据存储区中，你可以执行通配符搜索部分路径带有通配符字符开头，结束时，或在搜索字符串文本的中间显示属性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以"~/approot"开头的所有路径属性将设置为"~/approot%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/approot", the property would be set to "~/approot%". 同样，对部分用户名通配符搜索可以显示的文本字符串中的任意位置的通配符字符属性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要查找与"John"开头的所有用户名称参数将如下所示"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the parameter would look like "John%". 以下查询限制也适用：The following query constraints apply: - 如果仅`scope`提供，和`query`是`null`或上的所有属性`query`返回`null`或默认值，则指示匹配的所有记录`scope`返回参数。If only `scope` is provided, and `query` is `null` or all the properties on `query` return either `null` or default values, then all records matching the indicated `scope` parameter are returned. - 如果属性不是`null`，返回的记录也是匹配的筛选基于的路径属性值。If the property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on paths that match the property value. - 如果属性不是`null`，返回的记录也是匹配的筛选基于的用户名称属性值。If the property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on user names that match the property value. - 如果属性是否不等于，则返回的记录还筛选以返回与非活动用户关联的那些记录。If the property is not equal to , then the returned records are also filtered to return only those records associated with inactive users. 比较包括记录其中属性小于或等于属性。The comparison includes records where the property is less than or equal to the property. 请注意，此方法不会验证查询参数的组合。Note that this method does not validate combinations of query parameters. 例如，代码可以请求一组共享的范围中的特定用户名称与关联的个性化状态记录。For example, code can request a set of personalization state records associated with a specific user name in the shared scope. 由于用户名不与共享信息相关联，则返回的集合将为空。Because user names are not associated with shared information, the returned collection would be empty. 有可能会返回非空集合的参数组合包括：Parameter combinations that have the potential to return a non-empty collection include: - 与结合使用的作用域。 scope in combination with . - 作用域中的任意或全部的值组合， ，和属性。 scope in combination with the values for any or all of the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将查询通配符字符传递给基础数据存储区。This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 当前依赖于每个提供程序处理如星号 （\*）、 百分号 （%） 或下划线 (_) 字符的方式是支持通配符。Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常情况下，对于符合 SQL 数据存储区中，你可以执行通配符搜索部分路径带有通配符字符开头，结束时，或在搜索字符串文本的中间显示属性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以"~/approot"开头的所有路径属性将设置为"~/approot%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/approot", the property would be set to "~/approot%". 同样，对部分用户名通配符搜索可以显示的文本字符串中的任意位置的通配符字符属性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要查找与"John"开头的所有用户名称参数将如下所示"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the parameter would look like "John%". 以下查询限制也适用：The following query constraints apply: - 如果仅`scope`提供，和`query`是`null`或上的所有属性`query`返回`null`或默认值，则指示匹配的所有记录`scope`返回参数。If only `scope` is provided, and `query` is `null` or all the properties on `query` return either `null` or default values, then all records matching the indicated `scope` parameter are returned. - 如果属性不是`null`，返回的记录也是匹配的筛选基于的路径属性值。If the property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on paths that match the property value. - 如果不`null`，返回的记录也是匹配的筛选基于的用户名称属性值。If the is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on user names that match the property value. - 如果属性是否不等于，则返回的记录还筛选以返回与非活动用户关联的那些记录。If the property is not equal to , then the returned records are also filtered to return only those records associated with inactive users. 比较包括记录其中属性小于或等于属性。The comparison includes records where the property is less than or equal to the property. 请注意，此方法不会验证查询参数的组合。Note that this method does not validate combinations of query parameters. 例如，代码可以请求与共享的作用域中的非活动用户相关联的状态记录数。For example, code can request a count of state records associated with inactive users in the shared scope. 因为没有非活动的自定义项的概念，因此返回的计数将为零。Because there is no concept of inactive customizations, the returned count would be zero. 有可能会返回非空集合的参数组合包括：Parameter combinations that have the potential to return a non-empty collection include: - 与结合使用的作用域。 scope in combination with . - 作用域中的任意或全部的值组合， ，和属性。 scope in combination with the values for any or all of the , , and properties.

summary.span: 实现 Microsoft SQL Server 个性化设置提供程序所需的初始化过程。

span.span: Implements the initialization procedures required for a Microsoft SQL Server personalization provider.

span.span: This method is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供的初始化过程与 SQL 数据库使用个性化和不应在代码中直接使用。This method provides the initialization procedures for using personalization with a SQL database and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

summary.span: 根据指定参数从基础数据存储区加载个性化设置数据。

span.span: Loads personalization data from the underlying data store, based on the specified parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用`webPartManager`， `path`，和`username`参数作为检索关键字。This method uses the `webPartManager`, `path`, and `username` parameters as retrieval keys. 返回的数据包含：The returned data contains: - 中返回的数据`sharedDataBlob`参数。The data returned in the `sharedDataBlob` parameter. - 具体取决于键值，中返回数据`userDataBlob`参数。Depending on the key values, data is returned in the `userDataBlob` parameter. 非`null`值`userName`参数指示还检索数据。A non-`null` value for the `userName` parameter indicates that data is also retrieved. 自动更新对象中的列`aspnet_Users`每个时间特定于用户的个性化数据加载的页面请求的上下文中的数据库的表。The object automatically updates the column in the `aspnet_Users` table each time user-specific personalization data is loaded from the database in the context of a page request. 此行为允许使用其他 ASP.NET 功能属性时管理陈旧数据记录在站点上以及确定最近的用户活动。This behavior allows other ASP.NET features to use the property when managing stale data records as well as determining recent user activity on a site.

summary.span: 从基础数据存储区中删除个性化设置数据。

span.span: Deletes personalization data from the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法时 Web 站点用户选择重置 Web 部件页面上的数据从数据库中删除个性化数据。 uses this method to delete personalization data from the database when a Web site user chooses to reset Web Parts data on a page. 如果`username`为非`null`，与数据作用域数据是已删除; 否则为与数据删除作用域。If `username` is non-`null`, data with the scope data is deleted; otherwise, data with the scope is deleted. 自动更新对象中的列`aspnet_Users`从一个页面请求的上下文中的数据库中删除每个时间特定于用户的个性化数据的表。The object automatically updates the column in the `aspnet_Users` table each time user-specific personalization data is deleted from the database in the context of a page request. 此行为允许使用其他 ASP.NET 功能时管理陈旧数据记录在站点上以及确定最近的用户活动的值。This behavior allows other ASP.NET features to use the value when managing stale data records as well as determining recent user activity on a site.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ResetState (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope scope, string[] paths, string[] usernames);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ResetState(valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope scope, string[] paths, string[] usernames) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ResetState (scope As PersonalizationScope, paths As String(), usernames As String()) As Integer
public: override int ResetState(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PersonalizationScope scope, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ paths, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ usernames);

param.name: scope
param.span: 用于指示要查询的个性化信息。

span.span: A indicating the personalization information to be queried.

param.span: 此值不能为 。

span.span: This value cannot be .

param.name: paths
param.span: 范围中待删除的个性化设置信息的路径。

span.span: The paths for personalization information in the scope to be deleted.

param.name: usernames
param.span: 范围中待删除的个性化设置信息的用户名。

span.span: The user names for personalization information in the scope to be deleted.

summary.span: 根据指定参数从基础数据存储区中删除个性化设置状态信息。

span.span: Deletes personalization state information from the underlying data store, based on the specified parameters.
The number of rows deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不支持任何通配符。No wildcard characters are supported by this method. 允许仅以下的参数组合：Only the following combinations of parameters are allowed: - `scope`参数设置，并且所有其他参数设置为`null`。The `scope` parameter is set, and all other parameters are set to `null`. 此组合中删除与由个性化设置作用域关联的所有 Web 部件个性化数据`scope`。This combination deletes all Web Parts personalization data associated with the personalization scope indicated by `scope`. - `scope`参数设置，和`paths`参数包含至少一个值。The `scope` parameter is set, and the `paths` parameter contains at least one value. 此组合中删除指定的路径或由的个性化设置作用域中的路径的所有 Web 部件个性化数据`scope`。This combination deletes all Web Parts personalization data for the specified path or paths that are in the personalization scope indicated by `scope`. - `scope`参数设置为、`paths`参数已设置且只包含一个路径和`usernames`参数包含至少一个值。The `scope` parameter is set to , the `paths` parameter is set and contains only one path, and the `usernames` parameter contains at least one value. 此组合中删除所有用户个性化设置给定路径或多个用户中包含与该键关联的 Web 部件数据`usernames`。This combination deletes all user personalization Web Parts data for the given path that is associated with the user or users contained in `usernames`. - `scope`参数设置为、`paths`参数是`null`，和`usernames`参数包含至少一个值。The `scope` parameter is set to , the `paths` parameter is `null`, and the `usernames` parameter contains at least one value. 此组合跨所有路径或多个用户中包含与关联中删除所有的每个用户个性化 Web 部件数据`usernames`。This combination deletes all per-user personalization Web Parts data, across all paths, associated with the user or users contained in `usernames`. 参数值的任何其他组合无效，将引发异常。Any other combination of parameter values is invalid and will throw an exception. 例如，不允许使用以下两个组合：For example, the following two combinations are not allowed: - `usernames`参数不能提供时`scope`参数设置为。The `usernames` parameter cannot be provided when the `scope` parameter is set to . - `paths`参数不能包含多个条目时`usernames`参数不是`null`。The `paths` parameter cannot contain more than one entry when the `usernames` parameter is not `null`. `paths`和`usernames`包含在各自数组参数必须满足以下的验证规则。The `paths` and `usernames` parameters contained within the respective arrays must meet the following validation rules. 如果任何验证规则失败的任何成员的参数数组中，引发异常。If any validation rules fail for any member of the parameter arrays, an exception is thrown. 验证规则包括：The validation rules include: - `null` 不允许值。`null` values are not allowed. - 空字符串 ("") 不允许在修整字符串后。An empty string ("") after the string has been trimmed is not allowed. - 中包含没有用户名`usernames`参数可以包含逗号。No user names contained in the `usernames` parameter can contain commas. - 中的任何路径的长度`paths`参数不能大于 256 个字符。The length of any path in the `paths` parameter cannot be greater than 256 characters. - 在任何用户名称的长度`usernames`参数不能大于 256 个字符。The length of any user name in the `usernames` parameter cannot be greater than 256 characters.

exception.span: 或 参数为空数组。

span.span: Either the or the parameter is an empty array.
\- or -

exception.span: 包含在各自数组中的 和 参数不满足有效性规则。

span.span: The and parameters contained within the respective arrays do not meet the validation rules.

exception.span: 指定的 不是 枚举的成员。

span.span: The specified is not a member of the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ResetUserState (string path, DateTime userInactiveSinceDate);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ResetUserState(string path, valuetype System.DateTime userInactiveSinceDate) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ResetUserState (path As String, userInactiveSinceDate As DateTime) As Integer
public: override int ResetUserState(System::String ^ path, DateTime userInactiveSinceDate);

param.name: path
param.span: 要删除的个性化设置数据的路径。

span.span: The path of the personalization data to be deleted.

param.span: 此值可以为 ，但不能为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: This value can be but cannot be an empty string ("").

param.name: userInactiveSinceDate
param.span: 指示最后一次活动的日期。

span.span: The date indicating the last activity.

summary.span: 根据指定参数从基础数据存储区删除用户个性化设置数据。

span.span: Deletes user personalization data from the underlying data store, based on the specified parameters.

returns.span: 从基础数据存储区中删除的行数。

span.span: The count of rows deleted from the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的参数具有以下限制：This method's parameters have the following restrictions: - `path`参数不能包含通配符字符。The `path` parameter cannot contain wildcard characters. - 如果`path`参数为非`null`，然后仅每用户个性化设置记录与关联`path`将被删除。If the `path` parameter is non-`null`, then only per-user personalization records associated with `path` will be deleted. - 与在指定的日期后被视为处于非活动状态的用户相关联的仅每用户个性化设置记录`userInactiveSinceDate`参数将被删除。Only per-user personalization records associated with users that are considered inactive since the date specified in the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter will be deleted. 确切的比较就是删除记录其中属性小于或等于`userInactiveSinceDate`参数。The exact comparison would be to delete records where the property is less than or equal to the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter. - 如果提供了两个参数，则不会删除这两个约束相匹配的记录。If both parameters are provided, then records that match both constraints are deleted. - `path`参数可以为`null`。The `path` parameter can be `null`. - `path`参数修整后不能为空字符串。The `path` parameter cannot be an empty string after trimming. - 属性不能为 `null`。The property cannot be `null`.

exception.span: 是一个空字符串。

span.span: is an empty string.
\- or -

exception.span: 该路径的长度大于 256 个字符。

span.span: The path is greater than 256 characters in length.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void SavePersonalizationBlob (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager webPartManager, string path, string userName, byte[] dataBlob);

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void SavePersonalizationBlob(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager webPartManager, string path, string userName, unsigned int8[] dataBlob) cil managed

protected: override void SavePersonalizationBlob(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartManager ^ webPartManager, System::String ^ path, System::String ^ userName, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ dataBlob);

param.name: webPartManager
param.span: 管理个性化设置数据的 。

span.span: The managing the personalization data.

param.name: path
param.span: 指示要保存的个性化设置信息的 。

span.span: A indicating the personalization information to be saved.

param.span: 此值不能为 。

span.span: This value cannot be .

param.name: userName
param.span: 范围中要用作关键字的个性化设置信息的用户名。

span.span: The user name for personalization information in the scope to be used as the key.

param.name: dataBlob
param.span: 要保存的数据的字节数组。

span.span: The byte array of data to be saved.

summary.span: 将原始个性化设置数据保存到基础 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中。

span.span: Saves raw personalization data to the underlying Microsoft SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将非`null`提供用户名称，则`dataBlob`参数包含个性化设置数据范围; 否则为`dataBlob`假定包含的数据作用域。If a non-`null` user name is provided, then the `dataBlob` parameter contains personalization data for scope; otherwise, `dataBlob` is assumed to contain data for scope. 自动更新对象中的列`aspnet_Users`每个时间特定于用户的个性化数据保存到一个页面请求的上下文中的数据库的表。The object automatically updates the column in the `aspnet_Users` table each time user-specific personalization data is saved to the database in the context of a page request. 此行为允许使用其他 ASP.NET 功能属性时管理陈旧数据记录在站点上以及确定最近的用户活动。This behavior allows other ASP.NET features to use the property when managing stale data records as well as determining recent user activity on a site.
